https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/common/.title: Event Envelope v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/common/.description: Standard event envelope structure for all events in the Cypher ERP system. Provides unique identification, versioning, traceability, routing information, and priority-based processing.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/cart/ca.title: Cart Updated Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/cart/ca.description: Emitted when a shopping cart is modified. This includes additions, removals, quantity updates, and cart clearing operations.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/quote/q.title: Quote Created Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/quote/q.description: Emitted when a new quote is created in the system. Quotes are preliminary price estimates that can be converted to orders.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/order/o.title: Order Created Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/order/o.description: Emitted when a new order is created in the system. This is a critical P0 event that triggers inventory updates, payment processing, and order fulfillment workflows.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/order/o.title: Order Cancelled Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/order/o.description: Emitted when an order is cancelled. This triggers inventory adjustments, payment refunds, and notification workflows. This is a critical P0 event.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/credit/.title: Credit Changed Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/credit/.description: Emitted when a customer's credit status, credit limit, or balance changes. This is a critical P0 event for B2B customers and affects order processing and payment workflows.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/product.title: Product Updated Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/product.description: Emitted when a product's details are modified. This includes name, description, pricing, categorization, and other product attributes. Price changes are emitted separately as price.changed events.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/stock/s.title: Stock Changed Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/stock/s.description: Emitted when inventory levels change for a product or variant. This is a critical P0 event that triggers stock level updates, reorder notifications, and backorder processing.

https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/price/p.title: Price Changed Event v1
https://schemas.cypher.ro/events/price/p.description: Emitted when product prices change. This is a critical P0 event that triggers price updates across all sales channels, affects active quotes, and may require order repricing. Separate from product.updated which handles non-price attributes.
